description: Charis Farms, founded in 2016, is an agricultural demonstration center located in Naivasha, Nakuru County, Kenya. Spanning 1.5 hectares, the farm serves as a hub for exhibitions and training aimed at empowering local farmers and promoting agritourism. Initially starting from a small balcony operation focused on dog breeding, Charis Farms has evolved to include a diverse range of agricultural activities, including the rearing of ornamental and domesticated birds, fish farming, and crop production.
name: Charis Farms
